name: TUNA
description: Tuna.fun is a Solana-based meme coin launchpad designed for seamless creation, discovery, and trading of community-driven tokens. Anyone can launch a token effortlessly, with high creator rewards, making it highly accessible for fun, speculative meme projects. The platform utilizes a bonding curve mechanism: token prices start low and rise progressively as users buy with SOL. Real-time tracking shows bonding progress, and once it reaches 100%, liquidity automatically migrates to a decentralized exchange (DEX) like Raydium, enabling broader trading. Users can explore trending tokens sorted by market cap, monitor recent purchases, and engage with popular themes such as $TUNA variants, $CORG, $WOJAK, and other viral meme coins. Tuna.fun prioritizes speed, low costs, and early-stage speculation in the volatile Solana meme ecosystem, fostering rapid community growth and high-risk, high-reward opportunities.
